interestingcomments.content:
My Z6 generates NEF files in the 20-30mb range. My D800 generates NEF files in the 50-70mb range. My D800 photos are much sharper, is this a reason for the difference in file size? /!/ Does it also include improved codecs? As we all know 5mb of storage would fill a room a few decades ago.

I'm very okay with having massive raw files, and if there's something Ive missed on the Z6 I'd love to be correxted!

interestingcomments.content: Nikon Z6 RAW on Mac OS X 10.13 (High Sierra) /!/ I have a question about an issue with RAW files from a Z6 on a Mac running 10.13. I am using the Photos application to process and manage my photos. So far it had been good enough for me, but I recently got a Z6, and now I can't access the RAW files from my computer. I have a laptop that runs Mojave, and it reads the files just fine, but I can't update my desktop computer. Is there any way to run Photos10.14 on High Sieraa, or is there another option to process and organize my files on my 10.13 Mac?
